data.eml:eml: Redescription of Hemieuryale pustulata von Martens, 1867 (Echinodermata, Ophiuroidea) based on Brazilian specimens, with notes on systematics and habitat association

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gondim, Anne Isabelley, Dias, Thelma Lúcia Pereira, Christoffersen, Martin Lindsey, Stöhr, Sabine (2015): Redescription of Hemieuryale pustulata von Martens, 1867 (Echinodermata, Ophiuroidea) based on Brazilian specimens, with notes on systematics and habitat association. Zootaxa 3925 (3): 341-360, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3925.3.2
